Description:
Turn-based strategy in which players will participate in the struggles between the samurai. In the single-player
campaign, players take on the role of a general who was betrayed and murdered. Upon awakening in the
afterlife, he quickly gathers himself a new army of undead and aims only to revenge. The whole story from
the beginning puts you in a pretty interesting story with unexpected twists, mysteries and secrets.

Features:
The very mechanics of fighting battles like all the familiar turn-based battle in which you need to defeat the
enemy with minimal losses, while maintaining the life of his general. All the units in your army has different
features and characteristics that good governance - The key to victory. Smart placement on the battlefield,
the right sequence of moves and many other aspects of the tactical actions will be your best allies.

Installation:
1. Mount the image.
2. Install the game.
3. Play.
